title: 'My heart, my heart' - girlfriend of murder victim Reece (16) tells of agonising final phonecall
text: 'My heart, my heart' - girlfriend of murder victim Reece (16) tells of agonising final phonecall Independent.ie Murder victim Reece Cullen was on the phone arranging to meet his girlfriend when he was stabbed in the chest and left to die. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/my-heart-my-heart-girlfriend-of-murder-victim-reece-16-tells-of-agonising-final-phonecall-35348350.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35348744.ece/3937d/AUTOCROP/h342/Reece2.jpg Sophie Evans (17), girlfriend of Reece Cullen who was stabbed to death Sophie Evans (17), pictured right, with her Cousin Chelsea O’Brien (17) holding pictures of murder victim Reece Cullen Murder victim Reece Cullen was on the phone arranging to meet his girlfriend when he was stabbed in the chest and left to die.
